## Pull Request Checklist

Before submitting your PR, please ensure:

- [ ] **Code is in English**: All comments, variable names, function names, commit messages, and PR descriptions are in English
- [ ] **Typecheck passes**: Run `npm run typecheck` locally
- [ ] **Build succeeds**: Run `npm run build` locally
- [ ] **Separation of Concerns**: Backend returns JSON only, no HTML in JS/TS (see ARCHITECTURE.md)
- [ ] **Tests pass** (if applicable)

## Description

<!-- Provide a clear description of what this PR does and why -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI/CD or tooling change
